title: Pset_MechanicalFastenerAnchorBolt
description: Properties common to different types of anchor bolts.

AnchorBoltLength.title: AnchorBoltLength
AnchorBoltLength.description: The length of the anchor bolt.

AnchorBoltDiameter.title: AnchorBoltDiameter
AnchorBoltDiameter.description: The nominal diameter of the anchor bolt bar(s).

AnchorBoltThreadLength.title: AnchorBoltThreadLength
AnchorBoltThreadLength.description: The length of the threaded part of the anchor bolt.

AnchorBoltProtrusionLength.title: AnchorBoltProtrusionLength
AnchorBoltProtrusionLength.description: The length of the protruding part of the anchor bolt.
